mapper.select: select c.CLAZZ_ID as clazzId, c.CLAZZ_NAME as clazzName, c.GRADE_NAME as gradeName, m.MAJOR_ID as majorId, m.MAJOR_NAME as majorName, c.INSTRUCTOR_ID as instructorId, s.STAFF_NAME as staffName from EAS_CLAZZ c left join EAS_MAJOR m on c.MAJOR_ID = m.MAJOR_ID left join EAS_STAFF s on c.INSTRUCTOR_ID = s.STAFF_ID ${ew.customSqlSegment}
